LanguageData.GarryFlowers_Slavery_StatusSymbol.label: Plebeians
LanguageData.GarryFlowers_Slavery_StatusSymbol.descri:
We do not have slaves, but instead have a hightened class of senators, and a lower class of workers known as plebeians.
Plebeians will not start rebellions against their senatorial overlords unless the majority have significant break risks.
Senators will get a mood bonus for having maintaining high moods amongst the Plebians.
